author: gandalf_the_dust_wizard
content:
Apologies, I got caught up in meetings yesterday. Thanks for your response both <@144468805697929216> and <@199561711278227457>! Of course this is just an estimate based on our past usage, but anywhere from **5k-10k per month** would be enough to make our faucet sustainable. 

And in answer to <@199561711278227457> question around sybil mechanism, these are the following condition that we've put in place to prevent faucet abuse:

- Google reCAPTCHA verification - prevent bot attack
 - Login requirement (get a rockX account) -get 0.05 ETH/day
 - Twitter account requirement (need to have a twitter account to share a post) - get 0.10 ETH/day
 - Discord account requirement - get 0.05 ETH, 1 time only
 - Make a successful API call requirement - get 0.20 ETH, 1 time only

**Total eth claimable per day is 0.5 per user**
*Note: Twitter account and Discord account are bound to the user's RockX account*

author: gandalf_the_dust_wizard
content: Thanks so much for expanding on that napkin math, It was really helpful for our team's internal discussions. I'll definitely be joining the Holesky Planning call on the 29th.

author: jgm
content: Please can you DM me a sepolia address and I'll send you some funds.
